newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnish SOM adds Asko, Tamro and YIT to FOX index.
newsitem.headline: Finnish SOM adds Asko, Tamro and YIT to FOX index.

text.p: Finnish derivatives exchange SOM Oy said in a statement on Monday it would add the shares of Asko, Tamro and YIT-Yhtyma to its FOX portfolio and derivatives benchmark idex from August 1.
They would replace Cultor II, Finnair and TT-Tieto, it said.

The FOX index gauges the 25 most traded shares on the Helsinki Stock Exchange in the previous six months, and it is updated twice a year. It is widely used as a benchmark by investment professionals and investors.
SOM listed the following FOX constituents from August 1: Merita A Rauma Nokia A
